page.title: 04Lifestyles in Stallingboro'
page.content: Fashion. Being rural fashion is very conservative, the teenagers less so. Beauty. There is no hairdressers in the village, although several girls do hair in their customers homes. Avon cosmetics are sold by an agent going into homes, showing customers a catalogue and then ordering goods for them. Public House - called the Green Man, this opens lunchtimes (when food is served) and evenings. A piano is played on Saturday evenings. One of the main social meeting places. Village Hall. This holds app. 160 and is often used for Bingo evenings to raise money for clubs etc. as well as many other uses, Coffee Evenings, Playgroup, Dances, Wedding Receptions, etc. Gambling. Besides Bingo the village has Grimsby Town Football Club supporters selling lottery tickets. Also a delivery of Football Pools.
